channel.title: Wiki General
channel.description: Discuss the project in general, content structure and help with Wiki.

item.title: Overhauling Unreal II wiki & verifying content
item.author: invalid@example.com (Autonomous)
item.dc:creator: Autonomous
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone,

Ever since Unreal II: The Awakening came out, I fell in-love with the series, but more importantly with the hidden lore. However Unreal II information is scarce and when there is information, it's short. I haven't stumbled across any fan fiction too, like you would with the Halo series, or Half-Life 2.

I recently bought the game again (I've been in love with it since it first came out in 2003 and played it for countless hours) and I thought that perhaps I could, with some...

Overhauling Unreal II wiki & verifying content

item.title: Need help
item.author: invalid@example.com (Echolipse)
item.dc:creator: Echolipse
item.content:encoded:
I am currently working on a college project using Unreal Editor for 2004. I have a couple quick questions and I would be greatly appreciative if anyone can lend some assistance.

First off, im trying to figure out a way to change the NPC status from neutral (not against you in general) to enemy using a trigger.

Second, I'm trying to add in a message using a trigger. Tried a few different things and still won't work.

Again any assistance would be great. Thanx in advance.

item.title: Wiki having hiccups
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zur)
item.dc:creator: Zur
item.content:encoded:
I just visited the wiki and got this message twice :

Database error
A database query syntax error has occurred. This may indicate a bug in the software. The last attempted database query was:

(SQL query hidden)

from within function "MediaWikiBagOStuff::_doinsert". MySQL returned error "1213: Deadlock found when trying to get lock; try restarting transaction (christy)".
Click to expand...

item.title: Anonymous editing is back
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wormbo)
item.dc:creator: Wormbo
item.content:encoded:
If you don't mind Recent Changes listing your full IP address, you can now edit pages without logging in. You will be asked to solve a simple math CAPTCHA when you try to save the page, though. The CAPTCHA is also presented to new users who want to create an account, if your login details are repeatedly incorrect (to prevent a scripted attack on user account passwords) or...

Anonymous editing is back

item.title: Whoa, new look!
item.author: invalid@example.com (SuperApe)
item.dc:creator: SuperApe
item.content:encoded:
Wow, what happened?

(This will take some getting used to.)

item.title: Abs != Modulo
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zur)
item.dc:creator: Zur
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

The description on the following wiki page is incorrect.

Modulo is the operator that is usually symbolized by % and returns the remainder when a number A is divided by a number B.

http://www.unrealwiki.com/Legacy:Global_Function_(UT)

float Abs (float A) [static]
Returns the absolute value (also known as the modulo) of A, usually written |A|. Eg: Abs(5) == Abs(-5) == 5.
Click to expand...

item.title: usernames
item.author: invalid@example.com (walshlg)
item.dc:creator: walshlg
item.content:encoded: it seems that certain characters can't be used for UnrealWiki usernames. That's fine but the limitations aren't listed on the create an account page so you have to guess. A little note there would be helpfull. For example, I couldn't use [sSs]Bison_Boy.

basically i am a noob mapper. i used wiki (good site) to learn the basics of mapping but when i want to translate my own ideas into a map i get stuck. This is because i do not have a full understanding of the tools due to the simple tutorials on offer.

Basically i feel that for a n00b to learn they need to see...

item.title: Banned From Wiki
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nokturnal)
item.dc:creator: Nokturnal
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I am currently located in india. I read about the wiki being bombed using a indian isp reliance. I am currently using a ISP called Sify. Turns out i am getting the banned message at the wiki , thus i am unable to access it. In fact none of my friends on the same ISP can access it. Is there a solution to this ? Or i will have to change Isp.

Thanks.

item.title: GOOGLE for Wiki Search!!?!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Button-Fingerz)
item.dc:creator: Button-Fingerz
item.content:encoded:
I signed up for these forums for the express purpose of saying I can't believe you guys decided to GOOGLE for your search backend! WTF WTF WTF!
Lately I've started a little project (I'm an amateur UT99 Mapper). I go to the wiki to brush up on things like triggers, movers, etc.
What in the heck was the matter with the search you guys already had in place? OMG.
Come on guys, what are you really saving? Disk space? Bandwidth? Are y'all gettin paid? I can't for the life of me figure out WHY you...

GOOGLE for Wiki Search!!?!
